entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Stony Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -13.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stony Rapids Airport 3:36 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -13.0°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -16.4°C
Wind: W 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
